ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Space Insight (一)
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Gain understanding of the Space Dao- the insights on reality’s dimensions and its interactions with energy.

ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.label: Space Insight (二)
ItsSorceryFramework.LearningTreeNodeDef.description: Gain understanding of the Space Dao- the insights on reality’s dimensions and its interactions with energy. Increases maximum qi by a multiplier.
